title: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. This issue was observed on 20020326, Win2K.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: The Help view should be accessible via the keyboard immediately upon launching it.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the Help view. 
2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key. 
3. Observe that the tab key does not work. 
4. Click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner, nav frame, or content frame). 
5. Now attempt to navigate using the tab key and confirm that it works as expected.
